anya-e0805n5:3: Atha ākhyātavibhattiyo kriyāvācīhi dhātūhi parā vuccante.
anya-e0805n5:4: Tattha kriyaṁ ācikkhatīti ākhyātaṁ, kriyāpadaṁ. Vuttañhi ‘‘kālakārakapurisaparidīpakaṁ kriyālakkhaṇamākhyātika’’nti. Tattha kāloti atītādayo, kārakamiti kammakattubhāvā, purisāti paṭhamamajjhimuttamā, kriyāti gamanapacanādiko dhātvattho, kriyālakkhaṇaṁ saññāṇaṁ etassāti kriyālakkhaṇaṁ, atiliṅgañca.
anya-e0805n5:8: Kālādivasena dhātvatthaṁ vibhajantīti vibhattiyo, tyādayo, tā pana vattamānā pañcamī sattamī parokkhāhiyyattanī ajjatanī bhavissantī kālātipatti cāti aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti.
anya-e0805n5:9: Kriyaṁ dhārentīti dhātavo, bhūvādayo, khādidhātuppaccayantā ca, te pana atthavasā dvidhā bhavanti sakammakā, akammakā cāti. Tatra sakammakā ye dhātavokammāpekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadanti, yathā – kaṭaṁ karoti, gāmaṁ gacchati, odanaṁ pacatītiādayo, akammakā ye kammanirapekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadanti, yathā – acchati, seti, tiṭṭhatītiādayo.
anya-e0805n5:10: Te pana sattavidhā bhavanti vikaraṇappaccayabhedena, kathaṁ? Avikaraṇā bhūvādayo. Niggahītapubbakaavikaraṇā rudhādayo, yavikaraṇā divādayo, ṇuṇā uṇāvikaraṇā svādayo, nāppaṇhāvikaraṇā kiyādayo, oyiravikaraṇā tanādayo, sakatthe ṇe ṇayantā curādayoti.
anya-e0805n5:11: Tattha paṭhamaṁ avikaraṇesu bhūvādīsu dhātūsu paṭhamabhūtā akammakā bhūiccetasmā dhātuto tyādayo parā yojīyante.
anya-e0805n5:12: Bhūsattāyaṁ, ‘‘bhū’’iccayaṁ dhātu sattāyamatthe vattate, kriyāsāmaññabhūte bhavane vattateti attho.
anya-e0805n5:15: Bhūiccevamādayo ye kriyāvācino saddagaṇā, te dhātusaññā honti. Bhū ādi yesaṁ te bhūvādayo, atha vā bhūvā ādī pakārā yesaṁ te bhūvādayo.
anya-e0805n5:20: Anekassarassa dhātussa anto kvaci lopo hoti.
anya-e0805n5:21: Kvaciggahaṇaṁ ‘‘mahīyati samatho’’tiādīsu nivattanatthaṁ, iti anekassarattābhāvā idha dhātvantalopo na hoti.
anya-e0805n5:23: 426.Vattamānā tianti, sitha, mima, teante, sevhe, emhe.
anya-e0805n5:24: Tyādayo dvādasa vattamānāsaññā hontīti tyādīnaṁ vattamānatthavisayattā vattamānāsaññā.
anya-e0805n5:29: Paccuppanne kāle gamyamāne vattamānāvibhatti hoti, kāloti cettha kriyā, karaṇaṁ kāro, rakārassa lakāro, kālo.
anya-e0805n5:33: Idha pana kālassa atītānāgatapaccuppannāṇattiparikappakālābhipattivasena chadhā bhinnattā ‘‘paccuppanne’’ti viseseti. Taṁ taṁ kāraṇaṁ paṭicca uppanno paccuppanno, paṭiladdhasabhāvo, na tāva atītoti attho.
anya-e0805n5:36: Tasmiṁ paccuppanne vattamānāvibhattiṁ katvā, tassā ṭhānāniyame ‘‘dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā’’ti paribhāsato dhātuto paraṁ vattamānappaccaye katvā, tesamaniyamappasaṅgesati ‘‘vatticchānupubbikā saddappaṭipattī’’ti parassapadavacanicchāyaṁ –
anya-e0805n5:38: Atha taddhitānantaraṁ vuccamānānaṁ sabbāsaṁ vattamānādīnaṁ aṭṭhavidhānaṁ vibhattīnaṁ yāni yāni pubbakāni cha padāni, tāni tāni atthato aṭṭhacattālīsamattāni parassapadasaññāni hontītiādimhi channaṁ parassapadasaññā, parassatthāni padāni parassapadāni, tabbāhullato tabbohāro.
anya-e0805n5:41: Kattarikārake abhidheyye sabbadhātūhi parassapadaṁ hotīti parassapadaṁ katvā, tassāpyaniyamappasaṅge vatticchāvasā –
anya-e0805n5:44: Tāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ parassapadāna’mattanopadānañca dve dve vacanāni yathākkamaṁ paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisasaññāni honti. Taṁ yathā? Ti antiiti paṭhamapurisā, si thaiti majjhimapurisā, mi maiti uttamapurisā. Attanopadesupi te anteiti paṭhamapurisā, se vheiti majjhimapurisā, e mheiti uttamapurisā. Evaṁ sesāsu sattasu vibhattīsupi yojetabbanti . Evaṁ aṭṭhavibhattivasena channavutividhe ākhyātapade dvattiṁsa dvattiṁsa paṭhamamajjhimauttamapurisā hontīti vattamānaparassapadādimhi dvinnaṁ paṭhamapurisasaññā.
anya-e0805n5:46: Tumhāmhasaddavajjite tulyādhikaraṇabhūte sādhakavācake nāmamhi payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi paṭhamapuriso hotīti paṭhamapurisaṁ katvā, tassāpyaniyamappasaṅge kriyāsādhakassa kattuno ekatte vattumicchite ‘‘ekamhi vattabbe ekavacana’’nti vattamānaparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ ti.
anya-e0805n5:47: ‘‘Paro, paccayo, dhātū’’ti ca adhikāro, ‘‘yathā kattari cā’’ti ito ‘‘kattarī’’ti vikaraṇappaccayavidhāne sabbattha vattate.
anya-e0805n5:49: Bhūiccevamādito dhātugaṇato paro apaccayo hoti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu paresu. Sabbadhātukamhiyevāyamissate.
anya-e0805n5:52: Kāritato aññesu paccayesu asaṁyogantānaṁ dhātūnaṁ vuddhi hoti. Caggahaṇena ṇuppaccayassāpi vuddhi hoti. Ettha ca ‘‘ghaṭādīnaṁ vā’’ti ito vāsaddo anuvattetabbo, so ca vavatthitavibhāsattho. Tena –
anya-e0805n5:55: Yuvaṇṇānampi ya ṇu ṇā-nāniṭṭhādīsu vuddhi na;
anya-e0805n5:60: Okārassa dhātvantassa sare pare avādeso hoti. ‘‘Saralopo mādesa’’iccādinā saralopādimhi kate ‘‘naye paraṁ yutte’’ti paranayanaṁ kātabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:61: So puriso sādhu bhavati, sā kaññā sādhu bhavati, taṁ cittaṁ sādhu bhavati.
anya-e0805n5:65: Satipi kriyāyekatte kattūnaṁ bahuttā ‘‘bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacana’’nti vattamānaparassapadapaṭhamapurisabahuvacanaṁ anti, pure viya appaccayavuddhiavādesā, saralopādi. Te purisā bhavanti, appayujjamānepi bhavati, bhavanti.
anya-e0805n5:68: Tulyādhikaraṇabhūte tumhasadde payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi majjhimapuriso hotīti vattamānaparassapadamajjhimapurisekavacanaṁsi, sesaṁ purimasamaṁ. Tvaṁ bhavasi, tumhe bhavatha, appayujjamānepi bhavasi, bhavatha.
anya-e0805n5:72: Tulyādhikaraṇabhūte amhasadde payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi uttamapuriso hotīti vattamānaparassapadauttamapurisekavacanaṁ mi, appaccayavuddhiavādesā.
anya-e0805n5:74: Akāro dīghamāpajjate himimaiccetāsu vibhattīsu. Ahaṁ bhavāmi, mayaṁ bhavāma. Bhavāmi, bhavāma.
anya-e0805n5:77: Sabbāsaṁ vattamānānaṁ aṭṭhavidhānaṁ vibhattīnaṁ yāni yāni parāni cha padāni, tāni tāni attanopadasaññāni hontīti teādīnaṁ attanopadasaññā.
anya-e0805n5:80: Kattari ca kārake abhidheyye dhātūhi attanopadāni honti. Caggahaṇaṁ katthaci nivattanatthaṁ, sesaṁ parassapade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ. Bhavate, bhavante, bhavase, bhavavhe, bhave, bhavāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:81: Paca pāke, dhātusaññāyaṁ dhātvantalopo, vuttanayeneva tyādyuppatti, ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānamabhāvā vuddhiabhāvovettha viseso. So devadatto odanaṁ pacati, pacanti, pacasi , pacatha, pacāmi, pacāma, so odanaṁ pacate, te pacante, tvaṁ pacase, tumhe pacavhe, ahaṁ pace, mayaṁ pacāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:84: Sabbesaṁ paṭhamamajjhimānaṁ, paṭhamuttamānaṁ, majjhimuttamānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vā purisānaṁ ekatobhidhāne kātabbe paro puriso yojetabbo. Ekakālānamevābhidhāne cāyaṁ. So ca pacati, tvañca pacasīti pariyāyappasaṅge tumhe pacathāti bhavati. Evaṁ so ca pacati, ahañca pacāmīti mayaṁ pacāma, tathā tvañca pacasi, ahañca pacāmi, mayaṁ pacāma, so ca pacati, tvañca pacasi, ahañca pacāmi, mayaṁ pacāma. Evaṁ sabbattha yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:85: Ekābhidhāneti kimatthaṁ? ‘‘So ca pacati, tvañca pacissasi, ahaṁ paciṁ’’ ettha bhinnakālattā ‘‘mayaṁ pacimhā’’ti na bhavati.
anya-e0805n5:86: Gamu sappa gatimhi, pure viya dhātusaññāyaṁ dhātvantalopo.
anya-e0805n5:89: Gamuiccetassa dhātussanto makāro ccho hoti vā sabbāsu vibhattīsu, sabbaggahaṇena mānanta ya kāritappaccayesu ca. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo. Tenāyaṁ –
anya-e0805n5:90: Vidhiṁ niccañca vāsaddo, māna’ntesu tu kattari;
anya-e0805n5:92: Appaccayaparanayanāni , so puriso gāmaṁ gacchati, te gacchanti, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā garupubbarassato parassa paṭhamapurisabahuvacanassa re vā hoti, gacchare. Tvaṁ gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha. Ahaṁ gacchāmi, mayaṁ gacchāma.
anya-e0805n5:93: Cchādesābhāve ‘‘lopañcettamakāro’’ti appaccayassa ekāro. Gameti, gamenti, saralopo. Gamesi, gametha. Gamemi, gamema.
anya-e0805n5:94: Attanopadepi so gāmaṁ gacchate, gacchante, gacchare. Gacchase, gacchavhe. Gacche, gacchāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:95: ‘‘Kuto nu tvaṁ āgacchasi, rājagahato āgacchāmī’’tiādīsu pana paccuppannasamīpe vattamānavacanaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:98: Gamuiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ghammādeso hoti vā. Ghammati, ghammanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:101: Bhāve ca kammani ca kārake abhidheyye attanopadāni honti, casaddena kammakattaripi. Bhavanaṁ bhāvo, so ca kārakantarena asaṁsaṭṭho kevalo bhavanalavanādiko dhātvattho. Karīyatīti kammaṁ. Akammakāpi dhātavo sopasaggā sakammakāpi bhavanti, tasmā kammani anupubbā bhūdhātuto vattamānattanopadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ te.
anya-e0805n5:104: Sabbadhātūhi paro bhāvakammesu yappaccayo hoti. Attanopadavisayevāyamissate, ‘‘aññesu cā’’ti sutte anuvattitavāggahaṇena yappaccaye vuddhi na bhavati, anubhūyate sukhaṁ devadattena.
anya-e0805n5:107: Anubhūyante sampattiyo tayā. Anubhūyase tvaṁ devadattena, anubhūyavhe tumhe. Ahaṁ anubhūye tayā, mayaṁ anubhūyāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:110: Attanopadāni kvaci parassapadattamāpajjante, akattariyevetaṁ. Yakārassa dvittaṁ, anubhūyyati mayā sukhaṁ, anubhūyyate vā, anubhūyyanti. Anubhūyyasi, anubhūyyatha. Anubhūyyāmi, anubhūyyāma. Dvittābhāve – anubhūyati, anubhūyanti.
anya-e0805n5:112: Bhāve adabbavuttino bhāvassekattā ekavacanameva, tañca paṭhamapurisasseva, bhūyate devadattena, devadattena sampati bhavananti attho.
anya-e0805n5:113: Pacadhātuto kammani attanopade yappaccaye ca kate –
anya-e0805n5:116: Tassa bhāvakammavisayassa yappaccayassa cavaggayakāravakārattaṁ hoti dhātvantena saha yathāsambhavaṁ. Ettha ca ‘‘ivaṇṇāgamo vā’’ti ito sīhagatiyā vāsaddo anuvattetabbo, so ca vavatthitavibhāsattho. Tena –
anya-e0805n5:117: Cavaggo ca ta vaggānaṁ, dhātvantānaṁ yavattanaṁ;
anya-e0805n5:119: Dhātvantassa cavaggādittā cakāre kate ‘‘paradvebhāvo ṭhāne’’ti cakārassa dvittaṁ. Paccate odano devadattena, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā garupubbarassato parassa paṭhamapurisabahuvacanassa kvaci re hoti. Paccare, paccante. Paccase, paccavhe. Pacce, paccāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:120: Parassapadādese paccati, paccanti. Paccasi, paccatha. Paccāmi, paccāma. Tathā kammakattari paccate odano sayameva, paccante. Paccati, paccanti vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:121: Gamito kammani attanopade, yappaccaye ca kate –
anya-e0805n5:124: Sabbehi dhātūhi tasmiṁ bhāvakammavisaye yappaccaye pare ivaṇṇāgamo hoti vāti īkārāgamo. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo. Cchādeso, gacchīyate gāmo devadattena , gacchīyante. Gacchīyase, gacchīyavhe. Gacchīye, gacchīyāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:128: Heṭṭhānuttehi parassevedaṁ, tena kaṭapavaggayakāralasanteheva dhātūhi paro yappaccayo pubbarūpamāpajjate vāti makārā parassa yakārassa makāro. Gammate, gamīyate, gammante, gamīyante. Gammase, gamīyase, gammavhe, gamīyavhe. Gamme, gamīye, gammāmhe, gamīyāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:129: Parassapadatte – gacchīyyati, gacchīyyanti. Gacchīyati, gacchīyanti vā. Gammati, gammanti. Gamīyati, gamīyanti. Ikārāgame gamiyyati, gamiyyanti. Tathā ghammīyati, ghammīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:131: 450.Pañcamī tu antu, hi tha, mi ma, taṁ antaṁ, ssuvho, e āmase.
anya-e0805n5:134: Āṇatyatthe ca āsīsatthe anuttakāle pañcamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n5:135: Satipi kālādhikāre puna kālaggahaṇena vidhinimantanājjhesanānumatipatthanāpattakālādīsu ca pañcamī. Āṇāpanamāṇatti, āsīsanamāsiṭṭho, so ca iṭṭhassa asampattassa atthassa patthanaṁ, tasmiṁ āṇatyāsiṭṭhe. Anu samīpe uttakālo anuttakālo, paccuppannakāloti attho, na uttakāloti vā anuttakālo, tasmiṁ anuttakāle, kālamanāmasitvā hotīti attho.
anya-e0805n5:136: Tattha āsīsanatthe bhūdhātuto pañcamīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ tu, appaccayavuddhiavādesā. So sukhī bhavatu, te sukhitā bhavantu.
anya-e0805n5:139: Akārato paro hivibhatti lopamāpajjate vā. Tvaṁ sukhī bhava, bhavāhi vā, himhi dīgho. Tumhe sukhitā bhavatha. Ahaṁ sukhī bhavāmi, mayaṁ sukhino bhavāma.
anya-e0805n5:140: Attanopade so sukhī bhavataṁ, te sukhitā bhavantaṁ. Tvaṁ sukhī bhavassu, tumhe sukhitā bhavavho. Ahaṁ sukhī bhave, mayaṁ sukhitā bhavāmase.
anya-e0805n5:141: Kammani anubhūyataṁ tayā, anubhūyantaṁ. Anubhūyassu, anubhūyavho. Anubhūye, anubhūyāmase. Parassapadatte anubhūyyatu, anubhūyyantu. Anubhūyatu, anubhūyantu vā, anubhūyyāhi iccādi. Bhāve bhūyataṁ.
anya-e0805n5:142: Āṇattiyaṁ kattari devadatto dāni odanaṁ pacatu, pacantu. Paca, pacāhi, pacatha. Pacāmi, pacāma. Pacataṁ, pacantaṁ. Pacassu, pacavho. Pace, pacāmase.
anya-e0805n5:143: Kammani yappaccayacavaggādi, paccataṁ odano devadattena, paccantaṁ. Paccassu, paccavho. Pacce, paccāmase. Parassapadatte paccatu, paccantu. Pacca, paccāhi, paccatha. Paccāmi, paccāma.
anya-e0805n5:144: Tathā so gāmaṁ gacchatu, gacchantu. Gaccha, gacchāhi, gacchatha. Gacchāmi, gacchāma. Gametu, gamentu. Gama, gamāhi, gametha. Gamemi, gamema. Gacchataṁ, gacchantaṁ. Gacchassu, gacchavho. Gacche, gacchāmase. Ghammādese ghammatu, ghammantu iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:145: Kammani gacchīyataṁ, gacchīyatu, gamīyataṁ, gamīyatu, gammataṁ, gammatu iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:146: Vidhimhi idha pabbato hotu, ayaṁ pāsādo suvaṇṇamayo hotūtiādi.
anya-e0805n5:147: Nimantane adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā bhojanaṁ, idha nisīdatu bhavaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:149: Anumatiyaṁ pucchatu bhavaṁ pañhaṁ, pavisatu bhavaṁ, ettha nisīdatu.
anya-e0805n5:150: Patthanā yācanā, dadāhi me gāmavarāni pañca, ekaṁ me nayanaṁ dehi.
anya-e0805n5:151: Pattakāle sampatto te kālo kaṭakaraṇe, kaṭaṁ karotu bhavaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:153: 453.Sattamī eyya eyyuṁ, eyyāsi eyyātha, eyyāmieyyāma, etha eraṁ, etho eyyāvho, eyyaṁeyyāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:157: Anumatyatthe ca parikappatthe ca anuttakāle sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n5:158: Atthaggahaṇena vidhinimantanādīsu ca sattamī. Kattumicchato parassa anujānanaṁ anumati, parikappanaṁ parikappo, ‘‘yadi nāma bhaveyyā’’ti sallakkhaṇaṁ nirūpanaṁ, hetukriyāya sambhave phalakriyāya sambhavaparikappo ca.
anya-e0805n5:159: Tattha parikappe sattamīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ eyya, appaccayavuddhādi purimasamaṁ, ‘‘kvaci dhātu vibhattī’’tiādinā eyya eyyāsi eyyāmi eyyaṁiccetesaṁ vikappena ekārādeso. So dāni kiṁ nu kho bhave, yadi so paṭhamavaye pabbajeyya, arahā bhaveyya, sace saṅkhārā niccā bhaveyyuṁ, na nirujjheyyuṁ. Yadi tvaṁ bhaveyyāsi, tumhe bhaveyyātha. Kathamahaṁ devo bhaveyyāmi, kiṁ nu kho mayaṁ bhaveyyāma. Tathā bhavetha, bhaveraṁ. Bhavetho, bhaveyyāvho.
anya-e0805n5:160: Patthane tu ahaṁ sukhī bhave, buddho bhaveyyaṁ, bhaveyyāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:161: Kammani sukhaṁ tayā anubhūyetha, anubhūyeraṁ. Anubhūyetho, anubhūyeyyāvho. Anubhūye, anubhūyeyyaṁ, anubhūyeyyāmhe. Parassapadatte anubhūyeyya, anubhūyeyyuṁ. Anubhūyeyyāsi iccādi. Bhāve bhūyetha.
anya-e0805n5:162: Vidhimhi so odanaṁ pace, paceyya, paceyyuṁ. Tvaṁ pace, paceyyāsi, tumhe paceyyātha. Ahaṁ pace, paceyyāmi, mayaṁ paceyyāma. Pacetha, paceraṁ. Pacetho, paceyyāvho. Pace, paceyyaṁ, paceyyāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:163: Kammani paccetha, pacceraṁ. Paccetho, pacceyyāvho. Pacce, pacceyyaṁ, pacceyyāmhe. Parassapadatte pacce, pacceyya, pacceyyuṁ. Pacceyyāsi iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:164: Anumatiyaṁ so gāmaṁ gacche, gaccheyya, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā eyyussa uṁ vā, gacchuṁ, gaccheyyuṁ. Tvaṁ gacche, gaccheyyāsi, gaccheyyātha. Gacche, gaccheyyāmi, gaccheyyāma. Game, gameyya, gamuṁ, gameyyuṁ. Game, gameyyāsi, gameyyātha. Game, gameyyāmi, gameyyāma. Gacchetha, gaccheraṁ. Gacchetho, gaccheyyāvho. Gacche, gaccheyyaṁ, gaccheyyāmhe. Gametha, gameraṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:165: Kammani gacchīyetha, gamīyetha, gacchīyeraṁ, gamīyeraṁ iccādi. Parassapadatte gacchīyeyya, gamīyeyya, gammeyya, gammeyyuṁ iccādi. Tathā ghamme, ghammeyya, ghammeyyuṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:168: 455.Hiyyattanī āū, ottha, aṁmhā, tthatthuṁ, sevhaṁ, iṁmhase.
anya-e0805n5:172: Hiyyopabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe vā appaccakkhe vā hiyyattanīvibhatti hotīti hiyyattanīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ ā.
anya-e0805n5:175: Kvaci dhātūnamādimhi akārāgamo hoti hiyyattanīajjatanīkālātipattiiccetāsu tīsu vibhattīsu. Kathamayamakārāgamo dhātvādimhīti ce?

Lacchasi, lacchatha. Lacchāmi, lacchāma. Chādesābhāve labhissati, labhissanti. Labhissasi, labhissatha. Labhissāmi, labhissāma iccādi. Alabhissa, alabhissaṁsu iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:297: Vaca viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ, vacati, vacanti. Vacasi, vacatha. Vacāmi, vacāma.
anya-e0805n5:300: Vaca vasa vahaiccevamādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ vakārassa ukāro hoti yappaccaye pare, ādisaddena vaḍḍhassa ca. ‘‘Vassa a va’’iti samāsena dutiyañcettha vaggahaṇaṁ icchitabbaṁ, tena akārassapi ukāro hoti, purimapakkhe paralopo. ‘‘Tassa cavagga’’iccādinā sadhātvantassa yakārassa cakāro, dvittaṁ. Uccate, uccante. Vuccate, vuccante. Vuccati, vuccanti vā iccādi. Tathā vacatu, vuccatu. Vaceyya, vucceyya. Avacā, avaccā, avacū, avaccū. Avaca, avaco, avacuttha. Avaca, avacaṁ, avacamhā. Avacuttha iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:302: Vacaiccetassa dhātussa akāro ottamāpajjate ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi. Avoci, avocuṁ. Avoco, avocuttha. Avociṁ, avocumha, ukārāgamo. Avoca, rassattaṁ, avocu iccādi. Avuccittha.
anya-e0805n5:303: Bhavissantimhi sappaccayaggahaṇena ssassa khādeso, ‘‘byañjanantassā’’ti vattamāne ‘‘ko khe cā’’ti dhātvantassa kādeso, vakkhati, vakkhanti. Vakkhasi, vakkhatha. Vakkhāmi, vakkhāma iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:305: Kamme uttaṁ, pubbarūpattañca vussati, vussanti iccādi. Vasatu. Vaseyya. Avasi, vasi.
anya-e0805n5:306: Bhavissantiyaṁ ssassa chādeso, dhātvantassa cakāro ca, vacchati, vacchanti. Vacchasi, vacchatha. Vacchāmi, vacchāma. Vasissati, vasissanti. Avasissa, avasissaṁsu.
anya-e0805n5:307: Tathā ruda assuvimocane, rodati, rucchati. Rodissati iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:308: Kusa akkose, āpubbo dvittarassattāni, appaccayavuddhiyo ca. Akkosati. Akkosatu. Akkoseyya.
anya-e0805n5:311: Kusa iccetasmā dhātuto īvibhattissa cchiādeso hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Akkocchi maṁ, akkosi vā. Akkosissati. Akkosissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:316: Hakārassa vipariyayo hoti yappaccaye pare, yappaccayassa ca lakāro hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo, tena ‘‘gayhatī’’tiādīsu lattaṁ na hoti, nimittabhūtassa yakārassevetaṁ lattaṁ, ‘‘vacavasa’’iccādinā uttaṁ. Vuyhati, vulhati, vuyhanti. Vahatu, vuyhatu. Vaheyya, vuyheyya. Avahī, avuyhittha, avahittha. Avahissati, vuyhissati. Avahissa, avuyhissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:319: Jaramara iccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ jīrajīyyamīyyādesā honti vā, saralopādi. Jīrati, jīranti. Jīyyati, jīyyanti. ‘‘Kvacā’’disuttena ekayakārassa kvaci lopo hoti. Jīyati, jīyanti.
anya-e0805n5:320: Kamme jīrīyati, jīrīyanti. Jīyiyyati, jīyiyyanti. Jīratu, jīyyatu. Jīreyya, jīyyeyya. Ajīrī, jīrī, jīyyī. Jīrissati, jīyyissati. Ajīrissa, ajīyyissa.
anya-e0805n5:321: Mara pāṇacāge, mīyyādeso, mīyyati, mīyyanti. Mīyati, mīyanti vā. Marati, maranti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:324: Disaiccetassa dhātussa passa dissa dakkhaiccete ādesā honti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo, tena dissādeso kammani sabbadhātuke eva. Passati, passanti. Dakkhati, dakkhanti.
anya-e0805n5:325: Kammani yakāralopo, dissate, dissante. Dissati, dissanti. Vipassīyati, dakkhīyati. Passatu, dakkhatu, dissatu. Passeyya, dakkheyya, disseyya.
anya-e0805n5:326: Hiyyattaniyaṁ ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā dhātuikārassa attaṁ, addasā, addasa. Kammani adissa.
anya-e0805n5:327: Tathā apassi, passi, apassiṁsu, passiṁsu. Apassi, passi, apassittha, passittha. Apassiṁ, passiṁ, apassimha, passimha. Addasi, dasi, addasaṁsu, dasaṁsu. Kammani adissaṁsu. Addakkhi, addakkhiṁsu.
anya-e0805n5:328: Passissati, passissanti. ‘‘Bhavissantimhi ssassa cā’’ti yogavibhāgena ssassa lopo, ikārāgamo ca, dakkhiti, dakkhinti. Lopābhāve dakkhissati, dakkhissanti. Apassissa, adakkhissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:332: Sadaiccetassa dhātussa sīdādeso hoti sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu kvaci. Sesaṁ neyyaṁ. Nisīdati, nisīdanti. Bhāve nisajjate, idha kvacādhikārena sīdā-deso na bhavati. Nisīdatu. Nisīde. Nisīdi. Nisīdissati. Nisīdissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:336: Yajaiccetassa dhātussa ādissa yakārassa ikārādeso hoti yappaccaye pare, saralopo. Ijjate mayā buddho. Tathā yajatu, ijjataṁ. Yaje, ijjetha. Yaji, ijjittha. Yajissati, ijjissate. Yajissa, ijjissatha iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:337: Vada viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ, tyādyuppatti, appaccayo ca.
anya-e0805n5:340: Vadaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa vajjādeso hoti vā sabbāsu vibhattīsu. Vibhatyādhikārattā cettha sabbāsūti atthato siddhaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:343: Bhūvādito paro appaccayo ettamāpajjate, lopañca vā. Vikaraṇakāriyavidhippakaraṇato cettha akāroti appaccayo gayhati.
anya-e0805n5:346: Appaccayassa ekāro, saralopādi, vajjeti, vadeti, vadati, antimhi –
anya-e0805n5:348: Idha dhātvādhikāre ākhyāte, kitake ca avihitalakkhaṇesu payogesu kvaci dhātūnaṁ, tyādivibhattīnaṁ, dhātuvihitappaccayānañca dīghatabbiparītaādesalopāgamaiccetāni kāriyāni jinavacanānurūpato bhavanti. Tattha –
anya-e0805n5:350: Āyūnaṁ vā vibhattīnaṁ, mhā, ssāntassa ca rassatā.
anya-e0805n5:351: Gamito cchassa ñcho vāssa, gamissajjatanimhi gā;
anya-e0805n5:352: Ucāgamo vā tthamhesu, dhātūnaṁ yamhi dīghatā.
anya-e0805n5:354: Okārā attamittañca, ātthā papponti vā tthathe.
anya-e0805n5:355: Tathā brūtoti antīnaṁ, au vāha ca dhātuyā;
anya-e0805n5:359: Ekārato parassa antiakārassa lopo, vajjenti, vadenti, vadanti. Vajjesi, vadesi, vadasi, vajjetha, vadetha, vadatha. Vajjemi, vajjāmi, vademi, vadāmi, vajjema, vadema, vajjāma, vadāma.
anya-e0805n5:360: Kammani vajjīyati, vajjīyanti. Vajjati, vajjanti. Vadīyati vā. Vajjetu, vadetu, vadatu. Vajje, vajjeyya, vade, vadeyya, vajjeyyuṁ, vadeyyuṁ. Vajjeyyāsi, vajjesi, vadeyyāsi. Avadi, vadi, vadiṁsu. Vadissati, vadissanti. Avadissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:361: Kamu padavikkhepe, appaccaye kate ‘‘kvacādivaṇṇānamekassarānaṁ dvebhāvo’’ti dvittaṁ, kavaggassa cavaggo.
anya-e0805n5:364: Abbhāsante niggahītañcāgamo hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo, tena kamādīnamevetaṁ. Caṅkamati, caṅkamanti iccādi. Kamati, kamanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:367: Jhecintāyaṁ, appaccaye ‘‘o, sare, e’’ti ca adhikicca ‘‘te āvāyā’’ti yogavibhāgena akāritepi ekārassa āyādeso, jhāyati, jhāyanti iccādi, visesavidhānaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:369: Tuda byathane, tyādyuppatti appaccayo, ‘‘aññesu cā’’ti etthānuvattita vāggahaṇena tudādīnaṁ vuddhiabhāvova viseso, tudati, tudanti. Tudasi, tudatha. Tudāmi, tudāma.
anya-e0805n5:370: Kamme ‘‘tassa cavagga’’iccādinā sadakārassa yappaccayassa jakāro dvittaṁ, tujjate, tujjante. Tujjati, tujjanti, tujjare vā. Tathā tudatu, tudantu. Tude, tudeyya, tudeyyuṁ. Atudi, tudiṁsu. Atudi, atudittha. Atudiṁ, atudimha. Atujjittha, atujji. Tudissati. Atudissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:371: Visa pavesane papubbo, so gāmaṁ pavisati, pavisanti. Pavisasi, pavisatha. Pavisāmi, pavisāma.
anya-e0805n5:372: Kamme pavisiyyate, pavisiyyante. Pavisiyyati, pavisiyyanti. Pavissate vā. Tathā pavisatu, pavisantu. Paviseyya. Pāvisi, pavisi, pāvekkhi pathaviṁ, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā ajjatanimhi visassa vekkhādeso ca. Pāvisiṁsu, pavisiṁsu.
anya-e0805n5:373: Kamme pāvisīyittha, pavisīyittha, pāvisīyi, pavisīyi. Pavisissati, pavisissanti. Pavisīyissate, pavisissate. Pāvisissa. Pāvisīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:379: Hū, bhū sattāyaṁ, tyādyuppatti ‘‘bhūvādito a’’iti appaccayo, ‘‘vā’’ti adhikicca ‘‘lopañcettamakāro’’ti bhūvādito parassa appaccayassa lopo, ‘‘aññesu cā’’ti vuddhi. So hoti, te honti, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā parasarassa lopo. Hosi, hotha. Homi, homa. Bhāve hūyate.
anya-e0805n5:380: Tathā hotu, hontu. Hohi, anakāraparattā hilopo na bhavati, hotha. Homi, homa. Bhāve hūyataṁ.
anya-e0805n5:381: Sattamiyaṁ saralopādi, heyya, heyyuṁ. Heyyāsi, heyyātha. Heyyāmi, heyyāma. Heyyaṁ vā. Bhāve hūyetha.
anya-e0805n5:382: Hiyyattaniyaṁappaccayalope ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā hūdhātussa ūkārassa uvādeso. Ahuvā, ahuvu, ahuvū. Ahuva, ahuvo, ahuvattha. Ahuvaṁ, ahuvamha. Ahuvattha, ahuvatthuṁ. Ahuvase, ahuvavhaṁ. Ahuviṁ, ahuvamhase. Bhāve ahūyattha.
anya-e0805n5:383: Ajjatanimhi ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā hūto īvibhattissa lopo rassattaṁ, so ahu, lopābhāve ‘‘karassa kāsattamajjatanimhī’’ti ettha ‘‘sattamajjatanimhī’’ti yogavibhāgena sāgamo, vuddhi, ahosi, ahesuṁ, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā okārassekāro. Ahavuṁ vā. Ahosi, ahosittha. Ahosiṁ, ahuṁ, parasarassa lopo, rassattañca, ahosimha, ahumha, rassattaṁ. Bhāve ahūyittha.
anya-e0805n5:384: ‘‘Hi lopaṁ vā’’ti ito ‘‘lopo, vā’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n5:386: Hūiccetassa dhātussa saro eha oha ettamāpajjate bhavissantimhi vibhattimhi, ssassa ca lopo hoti vā. Ikārāgamo, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n5:387: Hehiti, hehinti. Hehisi, hehitha. Hehāmi, hehāma. Lopābhāve – hehissati, hehissanti. Hehissasi, hehissatha. Hehissāmi, hehissāma. Ohādese – hohiti, hohinti. Hohisi, hohitha. Hohāmi, hohāma. Tathā hohissati, hohissanti. Hohissasi, hohissatha. Hohissāmi, hohissāma. Ekārādese – heti, henti. Hesi, hetha. Hemi , hema. Hessati, hessanti. Hessasi, hessatha. Hessāmi, hessāma. Bhāve hūyissate.
anya-e0805n5:389: Hū, bhū sattāyaṁ, bhū itīdha anupubbo, tyādyuppatti appaccayassa lopavuddhiyo, anubhoti, anubhonti. Anubhosi, anubhotha. Anubhomi, anubhoma.
anya-e0805n5:390: Kamme anubhūyati, anubhūyanti. Tathā anubhotu, anubhontu. Anubhohi, anubhotha. Anubhomi, anubhoma. Anubhūyatu, anubhūyantu. Anubhave, anubhaveyya. Anubhūyeyya. Anubhosi, anubhavi. Anubhossati, anubhossanti. Anubhossasi, anubhossatha. Anubhossāmi, anubhossāma. Anubhavissati vā. Anubhossa, anubhavissa vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:391: Sī saye appaccayalopo, vuddhi ca, seti, senti. Sesi, setha. Semi, sema. Sete, sente iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:395: Ekārassa dhātvantassa sare pare ayādeso hoti, saralopādi. Sayati, sayanti. Sayasi, sayatha. Sayāmi, sayāma.
anya-e0805n5:396: Kammeatipubbo, ‘‘kvaci dhātvā’’dinā yamhi rassasarassa dhātvantassa dīgho, atisīyate, atisīyante. Atisīyati, atisīyanti. Bhāve sīyate.
anya-e0805n5:397: Tathā setu, sentu. Sehi, setha. Semi, sema. Sayatu, sayantu. Saya, sayāhi, sayatha. Sayāmi, sayāma. Sayataṁ, sayantaṁ. Sayassu, sayavho. Saye, sayāmase. Atisīyataṁ, atisīyantaṁ. Atisīyatu, atisīyantu. Bhāve sīyataṁ.
anya-e0805n5:398: Saye, sayeyya, sayeyyuṁ. Atisīyeyya. Bhāve sīyetha.
anya-e0805n5:399: Asayi, sayi, asayiṁsu, sayiṁsu, asayuṁ. Sāgame atisesi, atisesuṁ. Kamme accasīyittha, accasīyi, atisīyi. Bhāve sīyittha.
anya-e0805n5:400: Sayissati, sayissanti. Ikārāgamābhāve sessati, sessanti. Kamme atisīyissatha, atisīyissati. Bhāve sīyissate.
anya-e0805n5:402: Nī pāpuṇane, dvikammakoyaṁ, ajaṁ gāmaṁ neti, nenti. Nesi, netha. Nemi, nema. Lopābhāve nayati, nayanti iccādi. Kamme nīyate gāmaṁ ajo devadattena, nīyare, nīyante. Nīyati, nīyanti.
anya-e0805n5:403: Tathā netu, nayatu. Nīyataṁ, nīyantaṁ. Naye, nayeyya. Nīyetha, nīyeyya. Anayi, nayi, anayiṁsu, nayiṁsu. Vinesi, vinesuṁ. Anīyittha, nīyittha. Nayissati , nessati. Nayissate, nīyissate, nīyissati. Anayissa, anīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:406: Ṭhāiccetassa dhātussa tiṭṭhādeso hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo, appaccayalopo. Tiṭṭhati, tiṭṭhanti. Ṭhāti, ṭhanti. Lopābhāve ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā ṭhāto hakārāgamo ca rassattaṁ, saṁpubbo saṇṭhahati, saṇṭhahanti. Ette adhiṭṭheti, adhiṭṭhenti.
anya-e0805n5:408: 493.Yamhi dādhā mā ṭhā hā pā maha mathādīnamī.
anya-e0805n5:409: Bhāvakammavisaye yamhi paccaye pare dā dhā mā ṭhā hāpā maha matha iccevamādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ anto īkāramāpajjate, niccatthoyamārambho. Upaṭṭhīyati, upaṭṭhīyanti. Hakārāgame rassattaṁ, īkārāgamo ca, patiṭṭhahīyati, patiṭṭhahīyanti. Bhāve ṭhīyate.
anya-e0805n5:410: Tathā tiṭṭhatu, tiṭṭhantu. Ṭhātu, ṭhantu. Saṇṭhahatu, saṇṭhahantu. Tiṭṭhe, tiṭṭheyya. Saṇṭhe, saṇṭheyya, saṇṭheyyuṁ. Saṇṭhahe, saṇṭhaheyyuṁ. Aṭṭhāsi, aṭṭhaṁsu. Saṇṭhahi, saṇṭhahiṁsu. Pakiṭṭhissati, patiṭṭhissanti. Ṭhassati, ṭhassanti. Patiṭṭhahissati, patiṭṭhahissanti. Patiṭṭhissa, patiṭṭhissaṁsu. Patiṭṭhahissa, patiṭṭhahissaṁsu iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:413: Pāiccetassa dhātussa pibādeso hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo.
anya-e0805n5:414: Pibati. Pibatu. Pibeyya. ‘‘Kvaci dhātvā’’dinā bakārassa vakāro, pivati, pivanti. Pāti, pānti, panti vā. Pīyate, pīyante. Pīyati, pīyanti. Pivatu. Piveyya. Apāyi, pivi. Pivissati. Apivissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:415: Asa bhuvi, vibhattuppatti, appaccayalopo, asa itīdha –
anya-e0805n5:418: Asaiccetasmā dhātumhā parassa tissa vibhattissa tthittaṁ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Atthi.
anya-e0805n5:421: Sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu ca asaiccetāya dhātuyā ādissa lopo hoti vā, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo. Santi.
anya-e0805n5:424: Asadhātussa antalopo hoti simhi vibhattimhi ca. Tvaṁ asi.
anya-e0805n5:426: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā parassa thassa vibhattissa tthattaṁ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Tumhe attha.
anya-e0805n5:429: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā parāsaṁ mi maiccetāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ mhimhaiccete ādesā honti vā, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Amhi, amha. Asmi, asma.
anya-e0805n5:431: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā parassa tussa vibhattissa tthuttaṁ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Atthu. Asassādilopo ca, santu. Āhi, attha. Asmi, asma.
anya-e0805n5:432: Sattamiyaṁ asassādilopo, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā asato eyyaeyyuṁ vibhattīnaṁ iyāiyuñca honti. Siyā, siyuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:433: Lopābhāve ‘‘kvaci dhātvā’’dinā asato eyyādīnaṁ sadhātvantānaṁ ssa ssu ssa ssatha ssaṁ ssāmaādesā honti.
anya-e0805n5:434: Evamassa vacanīyo, assu. Assa, assatha. Assaṁ, assāma.
anya-e0805n5:435: Ajjataniyaṁ akārāgamo, dīgho ca, āsi, āsiṁsu, āsuṁ. Āsi, āsittha. Āsiṁ, āsimha.
anya-e0805n5:438: Asasseva dhātussa bhūādeso hoti vā asabbadhātuke. Bhavissati, bhavissanti. Abhavissa, abhavissaṁsu.
anya-e0805n5:440: Brū viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ, tyādyuppatti, appaccayalopo ca.
anya-e0805n5:443: Brūiccetāya dhātuyā paro īkārāgamo hoti timhi vibhattimhi kvaci, vuddhiavādesā, saralopādi. Bravīti, brūti, ‘‘aññesu cā’’ti suttānuvattitavāggahaṇena brūdhātussa byañjane vuddhi na hoti, bahuvacane ‘‘jhalānamiyuvā sare vā’’ti ūkārassa sare uvādeso, bruvanti. ‘‘Kvaci dhātvā’’dinā brūto tiantīnaṁ vā a u ādesā brūssa āhādeso ca.
anya-e0805n5:444: Āha, āhu. Brūsi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma. Brūte, bruvante. Brūse, bruvavhe. Bruve, brūmhe. Brūtu, bruvantu. Brūhi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma. Brūtaṁ, bruvantaṁ. Bruve, bruveyya, bruveyyuṁ. Bruveyyāsi, bruveyyātha. Bruveyyāmi, bruveyyāma. Bruvetha, bruveraṁ. Abruvā, abruvū.
anya-e0805n5:445: Parokkhāyaṁ ‘‘brūbhūnamāhabhūvā parokkhāya’’nti brūdhātussa āhaādeso, saralopādi, supine kira māha, tenāhu porāṇā, āhaṁsu vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:446: Ajjataniyaṁ abravi, abruvi, abravuṁ. Bravissati. Abravissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:447: Hana hiṁsāgatīsu, timhi kvaci appaccayalopo, hanti, hanati, hananti. Hanasi, hanatha. Hanāmi, hanāma.
anya-e0805n5:448: Kamme ‘‘tassa cavagga’’iccādinā ñattaṁ, dvittañca, haññate, haññante, haññare. Haññati, haññanti. Hanatu, hanantu. Haneyya.
anya-e0805n5:451: Hanaiccetassa dhātussa vadhādeso hoti vā sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo. Vadheti. Vadhīyati. Vadhetu. Vadhīyatu. Vadheyya. Avadhi, avadhiṁsu. Ahani, ahaniṁsu. Vadhissati, hanissati. Khādese paṭihaṅkhāmi, paṭihanissāmi. Avadhissa, ahanissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:453: Hu dānādanahabyappadānesu, tyādyuppatti, appaccayo ca, ‘‘kvacādivaṇṇānamekassarānaṁ dvebhāvo’’ti dvittaṁ, ‘‘pubbobbhāso’’ti abbhāsasaññā.
anya-e0805n5:456: Hakārassa abbhāse vattamānassa jo hoti. ‘‘Lopañcetta makāro’’ti appaccayalopo, vuddhi. Juhoti.
anya-e0805n5:459: Jhalasaññānaṁ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ yakāravakārādesā honti sare pareti apadantassa ukārassa vakāro.
anya-e0805n5:460: Juhvati, juhoti, juhvanti, juhonti. Juhvasi, juhosi, juhvatha, juhotha. Juhvāmi, juhomi, juhvāma, juhoma.
anya-e0805n5:461: Kamme ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā dīgho, hūyate, hūyante. Hūyati, hūyanti.
anya-e0805n5:462: Tathā juhotu, juhontu, juhvantu vā. Juhe, juheyya, juheyyuṁ. Ajuhavi, ajuhavuṁ. Ajuhosi, ajuhosuṁ. Ahūyittha aggi. Juhissati, juhissanti. Juhossati, juhossanti vā. Ajuhissa, ajuhissaṁsu iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:463: Hā cāge, pure viya dvebhāvajādesa appaccayalopā.
anya-e0805n5:467: Jahāti, jahanti. Jahāsi, jahātha. Jahāmi, jahāma.
anya-e0805n5:468: Kamme ‘‘yamhi dādhāmāṭhāhāpāmahamathādīnamī’’ti dhātvantassa īkāro. Hīyate, hīyante, hīyare. Hīyati, hīyanti.
anya-e0805n5:469: Tathā jahātu, jahantu. Jahe, jaheyya, jaheyyuṁ. Hīyetha, hīyeyya. Ajahāsi, ajahiṁsu, ajahāsuṁ. Pajahi, pajahiṁsu, pajahaṁsu, pajahuṁ. Kamme pajahīyittha, pajahīyi. Pajahissati, pajahissanti. Hīyissati, hīyissanti. Pajahissa, pajahissaṁsu iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:470: Dā dāne, tyādyuppatti, dvebhāvarassattāni, appaccayassa lopo, dadāti, dadanti. Dadāsi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma.
anya-e0805n5:473: Dāiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa dajjādeso hoti vā, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo, appaccayalopo. Dajjati, dajjanti. Dajjasi, dajjatha. Dajjāmi, dajjāma. Dajjādesābhāve ‘‘lopañcettamakāro’’ti appaccayassa ekāro, dānaṁ deti, denti. Desi, detha.
anya-e0805n5:476: Dāiccetassa dhātussa antassa aṁ hoti vā mimaiccetesu paresu, niggahītassa vaggantattaṁ. Dammi, damma. Demi, dema.
anya-e0805n5:477: Kamme ‘‘yamhi dādhā’’iccādinā īkāro, dīyate, dīyante. Dīyati, dīyanti. Dīyyate, dīyyante. Dīyyati, dīyyanti vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:478: Dadātu , dadantu. Dadāhi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma. Dadataṁ, dadantaṁ. Dadassu, dadavho. Dade, dadāmase. Dajjatu, dajjantu iccādi. Detu, dentu. Dehi, detha. Demi, dema. Kamme dīyataṁ, dīyantaṁ. Dīyatu, dīyantu.
anya-e0805n5:479: Sattamiyaṁ dade, dadeyya, dadeyyuṁ. Dadeyyāsi, dadeyyātha. Dadeyyāmi, dadeyyāma. Dadetha, daderaṁ. Dadetho, dadeyyāvho. Dadeyyaṁ, dadeyyāmhe. Dajje, dajjeyya.
anya-e0805n5:480: ‘‘Kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā eyyassāttañca, dajjā, dajjuṁ, dajjeyyuṁ. Dajjeyyāsi, dajjeyyātha. Dajjaṁ, eyyāmissa amādeso ca, dajjeyyāmi, dajjeyyāma. Dvittābhāve deyya, deyyuṁ. Deyyāsi, deyyātha. Dīyetha, dīyeyya.
anya-e0805n5:481: Hiyyattaniyaṁ adadā, adadū. Adado, adadattha. Adadaṁ, adadamha. Adadattha, adadamhase. Kamme adīyittha.
anya-e0805n5:482: Ajjatanimhi adadi, adadiṁsu, adaduṁ. Adajji, adajjiṁsu. Adāsi, adaṁsu. Adāsi, ado, adittha. Adāsiṁ, adāsimha, adamha. Adādānaṁ purindado. Kamme adīyittha, adīyyi.
anya-e0805n5:483: Bhavissantiyaṁ ikārāgamo, saralopādi, dadissati, dadissanti. Dajjissati, dajjissanti. Rassattaṁ, dassati, dassanti. Dassasi, dassatha. Dassāmi, dassāma. Dassate. Dīyissate, dīyissati.
anya-e0805n5:484: Kālātipattiyaṁ adadissa, adajjissa, adajjissā, adassa, adassā, adassaṁsu. Adīyissatha, adīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:485: Dhā dhāraṇe, pure viya vibhattuppatti, dvittarassattāni, appaccayalopo ca, ‘‘dutiyacatutthānaṁ paṭhamatatiyā’’ti dhakārassa dakāro, dadhāti, dadhanti. Apipubbo tassa ‘‘tesu vuddhī’’tiādinā akāralopo, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā dhakārassa hakāro, rassattañca, dvāraṁ pidahati, pidahanti. Dvebhāvābhāve nidhiṁ nidheti, nidhenti.
anya-e0805n5:487: Tathā dadhātu, pidahatu, nidhetu, nidhentu. Dadhe, dadheyya, pidahe, pidaheyya, nidhe, nidheyya. Dadhāsi, pidahi. Dhassati, pidahissati, paridahessati. Adhassa, pidahissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:489: Avuddhikā tudādī ca, hūvādi ca tathāparo;
anya-e0805n5:493: Rudha āvaraṇe, pure viya dhātusaññādimhi kate vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0805n5:496: Catuppadamidaṁ. Rudhaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato appaccayo hoti kattari vibhattippaccayesu, niggahītañca tato pubbaṁ hutvā āgamo hoti, tañca niggahītaṁ pakatiyā sarānugatattā dhātussarato paraṁ hoti. Casaddena iīeopaccayā ca, niggahītassa vaggantattaṁ. Idha saṁyogantattā na vuddhi hoti, tadāgamassa taggahaṇena gahaṇato.
anya-e0805n5:497: So maggaṁ rundhati, rundhanti. Rundhasi, rundhatha. Rundhāmi, rundhāma. Rundhate, rundhante iccādi, ikārādippaccayesu pana rundhiti, rundhīti, rundheti, rundhotītipi hoti.
anya-e0805n5:498: Kamme nipubbo yappaccayassa ‘‘tassa cavagga’’iccādinā sadhātvantassa jhakāre kate ‘‘vagge ghosā’’tiādinā dvittaṁ, maggo nirujjhate tena, nirujjhante. Parassapadatte nirujjhati, nirujjhanti. Nirujjhasi, nirujjhatha. Nirujjhāmi, nirujjhāma.
anya-e0805n5:499: Rundhatu, rundhantu. Rundhāhi, rundhatha. Rundhāmi, rundhāma. Rundhataṁ, rundhantaṁ. Rundhassu, rundhavho. Rundhe, rundhāmase. Nirujjhataṁ, nirujjhantaṁ. Nirujjhatu, nirujjhantu. Rundhe, rundheyya, rundheyyuṁ. Rundhetha, rundheraṁ. Nirujjhetha, nirujjheyya iccādi. Rundhi, rundhiṁsu. Arundhi, nirujjhittha. Nirujjhi, nirujjhiṁsu. Rundhissati, rundhissanti. Nirujjhissate, nirujjhissante. Nirujjhissati, nirujjhissanti. Arundhissa, arundhissaṁsu. Nirujjhissatha, nirujjhissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:500: Chidi dvidhākaraṇe, chindati, chindanti. Kamme chijjate, chijjante. Chijjati, chijjanti. Tathā chindatu, chindantu. Chijjatu, chijjantu. Chinde, chindeyya. Chijjeyya. Achindi, chindi, chindiṁsu. Achijjittha, chijji. Chindissati, chindissanti. Ssassa chādese – checchati, checchanti. Checchiti vā. Kamme chijjissate, chijjissante. Chijjissati, chijjissanti. Achindissa. Achijjissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:502: Yuja yoge, yuñjati, yuñjanti. Yujjate, yujjante. Yujjati, yujjanti. Yuñjatu. Yujjataṁ. Yuñje. Yujjetha. Ayuñji, ayuñjiṁsu. Ayujjittha, ayujji. Yuñjissati, yuñjissanti. Yujjissate, yujjissante. Yujjissati, yujjissanti. Ayuñjissa. Ayujjissatha, ayujjissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:504: Bhavissantiyaṁ ‘‘karassa sappaccayassa kāho’’ti sutte sappaccayaggahaṇena bhujato ssassa khādeso, ‘‘ko khe cā’’ti dhātvantassa kakāro, vuddhi, bhokkhati, bhokkhanti. Bhokkhasi, bhokkhatha. Bhokkhāmi, bhokkhāma. Khādesābhāve bhuñjissati, bhuñjissanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:505: Muca mocane, muñcati, muñcanti. Muccate, muccante. Muñcatu, muñcantu. Muccataṁ, muccantaṁ. Muñce, muñceyya, muñceyyuṁ. Muccetha, mucceraṁ. Amuñci, amuñciṁsu. Amuccittha. Mokkhati, mokkhanti. Muñcissati, muñcissanti. Muccissate, muccissante. Amuñcissa, amuccissatha iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:510: Divādito dhātugaṇato yappaccayo hoti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu.
anya-e0805n5:511: ‘‘Yaggahaṇaṁ, cavagga yakāra vakārattaṁ sadhātvantassa, pubbarūpa’’nti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n5:513: Yathā bhāvakammesu yappaccayassādeso hoti, tathā kattaripi yappaccayassa sadhātvantassa cavagga yakāravakārādeso, pubbarūpañca kātabbānīti dhātvantassa vakārattā saha tena yakārassa vakāre kate dvibhāvo, ‘‘do dhassa cā’’ti ettha caggahaṇena ‘‘bo vassā’’ti vuttattā vakāradvayassa bakāradvayaṁ, dibbati, dibbanti. Dibbasi, dibbatha. Dibbāmi, dibbāma.
anya-e0805n5:514: Kamme dibbate, dibbante. Dibbati, dibbanti. Dibbatu. Dibbataṁ. Dibbe. Dibbetha. Adibbi. Adibbittha. Dibbissati. Dibbissate. Adibbissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:515: Sivu tantasantāne, sibbati, sibbanti. Sibbatu. Sibbeyya. Asibbi, sibbi. Sibbissati. Asibbissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:516: Pada gatimhi, upubbo dvittaṁ, ‘‘tathā kattari cā’’ti sadhātvantassa yakārassa jakāro, dvittañca.
anya-e0805n5:518: Kamme paṭipajjate, paṭipajjante. Paṭipajjati, paṭipajjanti. Bhāve uppajjate tayā.
anya-e0805n5:519: Tathā uppajjatu. Uppajjeyya. Udapajjā. Udapajjatha. Udapādi, uppajjī. Uppajjittha. Uppajjissati. Uppajjissa, uppajjissā iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:520: Budha avagamane, yappaccayaparattā na vuddhi, jhakārādesova viseso, dhammaṁ bujjhati, bujjhanti. Bujjhate, bujjhante, bujjhare vā.
anya-e0805n5:521: Kamme bujjhate mayā dhammo, bujjhante. Bujjhati, bujjhanti. Bujjhatu. Bujjheyya. Abujjhi. Abujjhittha. Bujjhissati. Abujjhissa.
anya-e0805n5:525: Naha bandhane, ‘‘ha vipariyayo’’ti yogavibhāgena vipariyayo. Sannayhati, sannayhanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:526: Mana ñāṇe, ñādesova viseso, maññati, maññanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:527: Dā ādāne, saṁāpubbo ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā yamhi dhātvantassa ikāro, sīlaṁ samādiyati, samādiyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:528: Tusa pītimhi, yappaccayassa pubbarūpattaṁ, tussati, tussanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:531: Janajanane, ‘‘janādīnamā timhi cā’’ti ettha ‘‘janādīnamā’’ti yogavibhāgena yamhi dhātvantassa ākāro. Jāyati, jāyanti. Jāyate, jāyante.
anya-e0805n5:532: Kamme janīyati, janīyanti. Jāyatu. Jāyeyya. Ajāyi, ajani. Jāyissati, janissati. Ajāyissa, ajanissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:537: Suiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇu ṇāuṇāiccete paccayā honti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu. ‘‘Aññesu cā’’ti ettha caggahaṇena ṇuppaccayassa vuddhi. Tatthevānuvattitavāggahaṇena svādīnaṁ ṇuṇādīsu na vuddhi.
anya-e0805n5:538: Dhammaṁ suṇoti, saralopādi, suṇanti. Suṇosi, suṇotha. Suṇomi, suṇoma. Ṇāpaccaye suṇāti, suṇanti. Suṇāsi, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā rassattaṁ, suṇasi, suṇātha, suṇatha. Suṇāmi, suṇāma.
anya-e0805n5:539: Kamme yappaccaye ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā dīgho, sūyate, sūyante. Sūyati, sūyanti. Dvitte rassattaṁ, suyyati, suyyanti. Sūyyati, sūyyanti vā.
anya-e0805n5:540: Suṇotu, suṇantu. Suṇohi, suṇotha. Suṇomi, suṇoma. Suṇātu, suṇantu. Suṇa, suṇāhi, suṇātha. Suṇāmi, suṇāma. Suṇataṁ, suṇantaṁ . Suṇassu, suṇavho. Suṇe, suṇāmase. Kamme sūyataṁ, sūyantaṁ. Sūyatu, sūyantu.
anya-e0805n5:541: Suṇe, suṇeyya, suṇeyyuṁ. Suṇeyyāsi, suṇeyyātha. Suṇeyyāmi, suṇeyyāma. Suṇetha, suṇeraṁ. Suṇetho, suṇeyyāvho. Suṇeyyaṁ, suṇeyyāmhe. Sūyetha, sūyeyya.
anya-e0805n5:542: Asuṇi, suṇi, asuṇiṁsu, suṇiṁsu. Asuṇi, asuṇittha. Asuṇiṁ, suṇiṁ, asuṇimha, suṇimha. Asuṇittha, suṇittha. Ṇāpaccayalopo, vuddhi, sassa dvibhāvo, sāgamo, assosi, assosiṁsu, paccassosuṁ. Assosi, assosittha. Assosiṁ, assosimha, assosimhā vā, assosittha. Asūyittha, assūyi.
anya-e0805n5:543: Saralopādi, suṇissati, suṇissanti. Suṇissasi, suṇissatha. Suṇissāmi, suṇissāma. Suṇissate, suṇissante. Suṇissase, suṇissavhe. Suṇissaṁ, suṇissāmhe. Ṇāpaccayalopo, vuddhi, sossati, sossanti. Sossasi, sossatha. Sossāmi, sossāma. Sossate. Sūyissate, sūyissati. Asuṇissa. Asūyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:544: Hi gatimhi, papubbo ṇāpaccayo, pahiṇāti, pahiṇati vā, pahiṇanti. Pahiṇātu, pahiṇantu. Pahiṇeyya. Pahiṇi, dūtaṁ pāhesi. Pahiṇissati. Pahiṇissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:546: Mi pakkhepe, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā ṇassa nattaṁ, minoti, minanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:547: Apa pāpuṇane, papubbo saralope ‘‘dīgha’’nti dīgho, uṇāpaccayo, sampattiṁ pāpuṇāti, pāpuṇanti. Pāpuṇāsi, pāpuṇātha. Pāpuṇāmi, pāpuṇāma.
anya-e0805n5:548: Kamme pāpīyati, pāpīyanti. Tathā pāpuṇātu. Pāpīyatu. Pāpuṇe, pāpuṇeyya. Pāpīyeyya. Pāpuṇi, pāpuṇiṁsu. Pāpīyi. Pāpuṇissati. Pāpīyissati. Pāpuṇissa. Pāpīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:549: Saka sattimhi, dvibhāvo, sakkuṇāti, sakkuṇanti. Bhāve ‘‘pubbarūpañcā’’ti pubbarūpattaṁ, sakkate tayā, sakkati vā, sakkuṇātu. Sakkuṇeyya. ‘‘Kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā sakantassa khādeso ajjatanādimhi, asakkhi, sakkhi, asakkhiṁsu, sakkhiṁsu. Sakkhissati, sakkhissanti. Asakkhissa, asakkhissaṁsu iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:552: Kī dabbavinimaye, vipubbo dvittaṁ, pure viya vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0805n5:554: Kīicceva mādito dhātugaṇato nāpaccayo hoti kattari. Nāparattā na vuddhi, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā kiyādīnaṁ nāmhi rassattaṁ, kīto nāpaccayanakārassa ṇattañca.
anya-e0805n5:555: Bhaṇḍaṁ vikkiṇāti, vikkiṇanti. Vikkīyati, vikkīyanti. Vikkiṇātu, vikkiṇantu. Vikkīyatu, vikkīyantu. Vikkiṇe, vikkiṇeyya . Vikkīyeyya, vikkīyeyyuṁ. Avikkiṇi, vikkiṇi. Vikkīyittha, vikkīyi. Vikkiṇissati, vikkiṇissanti. Vikkīyissati, vikkīyissanti. Avikkiṇissa, avikkiṇissaṁsu. Vikkīyissa, vikkīyissaṁsu iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:556: Ji jaye, kilese jināti, jinanti. Jīyati, jīyanti. Evaṁ jinātu. Jīyatu. Jineyya. Jīyeyya. Ajini, jini, ajiniṁsu, jiniṁsu. Ajesi, ajesuṁ. Ajinittha. Ajīyittha, ajīyi. Jinissati, jinissanti. Vijessati, vijessanti. Jīyissati, jīyissanti. Ajinissa. Ajīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:557: Tathā ci caye, cināti, cinanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:561: Ñāiccetassa dhātussa jā jaṁ nāiccete ādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n5:562: Jādeso nāmhi jaṁ ñāmhi, nābhāvo timhi evidha;
anya-e0805n5:565: Kamme viññāyati, viññāyanti. Ivaṇṇāgame pubbalopo, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā ekāro, dvittañca, ñeyyati, ñeyyanti. Vijānātu, vijānantu, rassattaṁ. Vijāna, vijānāhi, vijānātha. Vijānāmi, vijānāma. Vijānataṁ, vijānantaṁ. Vijānassu. Viññāyatu, viññāyantu.
anya-e0805n5:567: Eyyassa vibhattissa ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa iyā ñāiccete ādesā honti vā, saralopādi. Vijāniyā.
anya-e0805n5:571: Ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa nāpaccayassa lopo hoti vā, yakārattañca, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo. Tena –
anya-e0805n5:576: Niggahītassa vaggantattaṁ, vijaññā, vijāneyya, vijāneyyuṁ. Vijāneyyāsi, vijāneyyātha. Vijāneyyāmi, vijāneyyāma, vijānemu vā. Vijānetha. Viññāyeyya, viññāyeyyuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:577: Samajāni, sañjāni, sañjāniṁsu. Nālope aññāsi, aññāsuṁ. Vijānittha. Viññāyittha. Paññāyi, paññāyiṁsu. Vijānissati, vijānissanti. Ñassati, ñassanti. Viññāyissate, viññāyissante. Paññāyissati, paññāyissanti. ‘‘Kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā ssassa hi ca, paññāyihiti, paññāyihinti. Ajānissa. Ajānissatha. Aññāyissatha, aññāyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:578: Mā māne, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā māntassa ikāro, mināti, minanti. Kamme mīyati, mīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:579: Lū chedane, nāmhi rassattaṁ, lunāti, lunanti. Lūyati, lūyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:580: Dhū kampane, dhunāti, dhunanti. Dhūyati, dhūyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:583: Gahaiccevamādito dhātuto ppa ṇhāiccete paccayā honti kattari. Ādisaddoyaṁ pakāro.
anya-e0805n5:586: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa hakārassa lopo hoti ṇhāmhi paccaye pare. Sīlaṁ gaṇhāti, rassatte gaṇhati vā, gaṇhanti. Gaṇhāsi, gaṇhātha. Gaṇhāmi, gaṇhāma.
anya-e0805n5:587: Kamme ‘‘ye’’ti vattamāne ‘‘havipariyayo lo vā’’ti hakārassa yakārena vipariyayo hoti. Gayhati, gayhanti.
anya-e0805n5:588: Gaṇhātu, gaṇhantu. Gaṇha, gaṇhāhi, gaṇhātha. Gaṇhāmi, gaṇhāma. Gaṇhataṁ, gaṇhantaṁ. Gayhataṁ, gayhantaṁ. Gayhatu, gayhantu. Gaṇhe, gaṇheyya, gaṇheyyuṁ. Gayheyya, gayheyyuṁ. Aggaṇhi, gaṇhi, aggaṇhiṁsu, gaṇhiṁsu.
anya-e0805n5:589: Yadā ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā asabbadhātuke vikaraṇapaccayassa lopo, ikārāgamassa ekāro ca, tadā sāgamo.
anya-e0805n5:590: Aggahesi, aggahesuṁ. Aggahi, aggahiṁsu, aggahuṁ. Aggayhittha, aggayhi. Gaṇhissati, gaṇhissanti. Gahessati, gahessanti. Gahīyissate, gahīyissante. Gayhissati, gayhissanti. Aggaṇhissa, aggahissa. Aggaṇhissatha, aggahissatha. Aggayhissatha, aggayhissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:593: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa gheādeso hoti ppappaccaye pare. Gheppati iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:598: Tanuiccevamādito dhātugaṇato oyiraiccete paccayā honti kattari. Karatovāyaṁ yirappaccayo.
anya-e0805n5:599: Dhammaṁ tanoti, tanonti. Tanosi, tanotha. Tanomi, tanoma.
anya-e0805n5:602: Tanādito okārappaccayo uttamāpajjate vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo. Ettha ca vikaraṇakāriyavidhippakaraṇato ‘‘okāro’’ti ovikaraṇaṁ gayhati. Tanute, bahuvacane ‘‘yavakārā cā’’ti vattaṁ, tanvante. Tanuse, tanuvhe. Tanve, tanumhe.
anya-e0805n5:603: Kamme ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā tanudhātvantassa yamhi ākāro, patāyate, patāyante. Patāyati, patāyanti. Ākārābhāve pataññati, pataññanti. Tanotu, tanontu. Taneyya, taneyyuṁ. Atani, ataniṁsu. Atāyittha, patāyi. Tanissati, tanissanti. Patāyissati, patāyissanti. Atanissa. Patāyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:608: Karaiccetassa dhātussa akāro uttamāpajjate vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo, ‘‘yavakārā cā’’ti apadantassa paraukārassa vakāro, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā dhāturakārassa vakārasmiṁ lopo, vakārassa dvitte tassa ‘‘bbo vvassā’’ti bakāradvayaṁ, kubbanti, karonti. Karosi, karotha. Karomi, karoma. Tathā kurute, kubbante. Kuruse, kuruvhe. Kubbe, kurumhe. Yirappaccaye rakāralopo, kayirati, kayiranti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:609: Kammeyappaccaye ‘‘ivaṇṇāgamo vā’’ti īkārāgamo, yakārassa dvittaṁ, karīyyate kaṭo tena, karīyyati, karīyyanti. Karīyati, karīyanti vā. Īkārābhāve ‘‘tassa cavagga’’iccādinā sadhātvantassa yakārattaṁ, dvittañca. Kayyati, kayyanti. Ikārāgame ‘‘kvaci dhātu’’iccādisutte caggahaṇena rayānaṁ vipariyayo, kayirati kaṭo tena, kayiranti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:610: Tathā kusalaṁ karotu, kurutu vā, kubbantu, karontu. Karohi, karotha. Karomi, karoma. Kurutaṁ, kubbantaṁ. Kurussu, kurassu vā, kuruvho. Kubbe, kubbāmase.
anya-e0805n5:611: Kamme karīyatu, karīyantu, kayyataṁ, kayirataṁ, kayiratu.
anya-e0805n5:612: Sattamiyaṁ kare, kareyya, kareyyuṁ. Kareyyāsi, kareyyātha. Kareyyāmi, kareyyāma. Utte kubbe, kubbeyya.
anya-e0805n5:616: Saralopādi, kayirā, kayiruṁ. Kayirāsi, kayirātha. Kayirāmi, kayirāma. Attanopade kayirātha dhīro, kubbetha, karetha vā, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā kussa kru ca, krubbetha, krubberaṁ. Krubbetho, krubbeyyāvho. Krubbeyyaṁ, krubbeyyāmhe. Kamme karīyeyya, karīyeyyuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:617: Hiyyattaniyaṁ ‘‘karassa kā’’ti yogavibhāgena kā hoti, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n5:618: Akā, akarā, akarū. Akaro, akattha, akarottha. Akaṁ, akaraṁ, akamha, akaramha. Akattha. Akariṁ, akaramhase.
anya-e0805n5:621: Kara iccetassa dhātussa sabbasseva kāsattaṁ hoti vā ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi pare. ‘‘Kāsatta’’miti bhāvaniddesena aññasmāpi dhātuto sāgamo. Atha vā yadā karassa kā hoti, sattañcāgamo ajjatanimhi vāti attho, tadā ‘‘sattamajjatanimhī’’ti yogavibhāgena aññasmāpi dhātuto sāgamopi sijjhati, ‘‘yogavibhāgato iṭṭhappasiddhī’’ti yebhuyyena dīghatova hoti, ‘‘karassa kā’’ti yogavibhāgena kābhāvo ca hiyyattaniyaṁ siddho hoti.
anya-e0805n5:622: Akāsi, akāsuṁ. Akāsi, akāsittha. Akāsiṁ, akāsimha. Akāsittha. Kāsattābhāve akari, kari, akariṁsu, kariṁsu, akaṁsu, akaruṁ. Akari, akarittha. Akariṁ, kariṁ, akarimha, karimha. Akarittha. Akarīyittha, akarīyi vā.
anya-e0805n5:623: ‘‘Vā, lopo, bhavissantimhi ssassa cā’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n5:625: Karaiccetassa dhātussa sappaccayassa kāhādeso hoti vā bhavissantimhi, ssassa ca lopo hoti. Adhikabhūtasappaccayaggahaṇena vacamucabhujādito ssassa khādeso, vasa chidi labhādito chādeso ca hoti.
anya-e0805n5:626: Kāhati, kāhanti. Kāhasi, kāhatha. Kāhāmi, kāhāma. Ikārāgame kāhiti, kāhinti iccādi. Kāhābhāve karissati, karissanti. Karissasi, karissatha. Karissāmi, karissāma. Karissate, karissante. Karissase, karissavhe. Karissaṁ, karissāmhe. Karīyissati, karīyissanti. Akarissa. Akarīyissā iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:627: Yadā saṁpubbo, tadā ‘‘purasamupaparīhi karotissa kha kharā vā’’ti yogavibhāgena tyādivibhattīsupi saṁpubbakarotissa kharādeso.
anya-e0805n5:628: Abhisaṅkharoti, abhisaṅkharonti. Abhisaṅkharīyati, abhisaṅkharīyanti. Abhisaṅkharotu. Abhisaṅkhareyya. Abhisaṅkhari, khādese abhisaṅkhāsi vā. Abhisaṅkharissati. Abhisaṅkharissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:629: Saka sattimhi, opaccayo, sakkoti, sakkonti. Sakkosi, sakkotha. Sakkomi, sakkoma iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:630: Apa pāpuṇane, papubbo, pappoti, papponti. Papposi, pappotha. Pappomi, pappoma. Pappotu, pappontu iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:633: Dhura theyye, pure viya dhātvantalopo, vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0805n5:634: ‘‘Tathā kattari cā’’ti ito ‘‘kattarī’’ti ca sīhavilokanena bhāvakammaggahaṇāni ca vattante, maṇḍūkagatiyā kāritaggahaṇañca.
anya-e0805n5:636: Curaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇe ṇayaiccete paccayā honti kattari, bhāve ca kammani, vibhattippaccayesu. ‘‘Kāritaṁ viya ṇānubandho’’ti ṇe ṇayānaṁ kāritabyapadeso.
anya-e0805n5:640: Asaṁyogantassa dhātussa kārite pare vuddhi hotīti ukārassokāro vuddhi.
anya-e0805n5:641: Dhanaṁ coreti, corenti. Coresi, coretha. Coremi, corema. Ṇayappaccaye – corayati, corayanti. Corayasi, corayatha. Corayāmi, corayāma. Corayate, corayante. Corayase, corayavhe. Coraye, corayāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:642: Kamme yappaccaye īkārāgamo, saralopādi ca, corīyate devadattena, corīyati, corīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:643: Coretu , corentu. Corehi. Corayatu, corayantu. Coraya, corayāhi.
anya-e0805n5:644: Coreyya, coreyyuṁ. Coraye, corayeyyuṁ. Acoresi, coresi, acoresuṁ, coresuṁ. Acorayi, corayi, acorayiṁsu, corayiṁsu, acorayuṁ, corayuṁ. Acoresi, acoresittha. Tvaṁ acorayi, acorayittha. Acoresiṁ, acoresimha. Acorayiṁ, acorayimha. Acorayittha. Acorīyittha, acorīyi.
anya-e0805n5:645: Corissati, corissanti. Corayissati, corayissanti. Corīyissate, corīyissante. Corīyissati, corīyissanti. Acorissa, acorayissa. Acorīyissatha, acorīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:646: Tathā cinta cintāyaṁ, saṁyogantattā vuddhiabhāvova viseso.
anya-e0805n5:647: Cinteti, cintayati, cintenti, cintayanti. Cintetu, cintayatu. Cinteyya, cintayeyya. Acintesi, cintesi, acintayi, cintayi. Cintessati, cintayissati. Acintissa, acintayissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:648: Manta guttabhāsane, manteti, mantayati iccādi purimasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:649: Pāla rakkhaṇe, dhammaṁ pāleti, pālayati. Pālīyati. Pāletu, pālayatu iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:650: Ghaṭa ghaṭane, ghāṭeti, ghāṭayati, ghaṭeti, ghaṭayati, ghaṭādittā vikappena vuddhi.
anya-e0805n5:652: Gaṇa saṅkhyāne, ‘‘ghaṭādīnaṁ vā’’ti na vuddhi, gaṇeti, gaṇayati iccādi, sabbattha subodhaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:654: Bhūvādī ca rudhādī ca, divādī svādayo gaṇā;
anya-e0805n5:655: Kiyādī ca tanādī ca, curādī cidha sattadhā.
anya-e0805n5:659: Tattha dhātvatthe niddiṭṭhā khādikāritantā paccayā dhātuppaccayā nāma.
anya-e0805n5:661: ‘‘Dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā’’ti ito dhātuggahaṇaṁ anuvattate, ‘‘parā, paccayā’’ti ca adhikāro.
anya-e0805n5:662: 528.Tija gupa kita mānehi kha cha sā vā.
anya-e0805n5:663: Tija gupa kita māna iccetehi dhātūhi kha cha sa iccete paccayā parā honti vā.
anya-e0805n5:664: Tijato khantiyaṁ khova, nindāyaṁ gupato tu cho;
anya-e0805n5:669: Dhātvantassa byañjanassa kakārādeso hoti khappaccaye pare.
anya-e0805n5:673: Dhātvatthe niddiṭṭhehi khādikāritantehi paccayehi tyādayo vibhattiyo hontīti pure viya vattamānādayo yojetabbā.
anya-e0805n5:674: Ativākyaṁ titikkhati, titikkhanti. Kamme titikkhīyati. Tathā titikkhatu, titikkhantu. Titikkheyya, titikkheyyuṁ. Atitikkhi, atitikkhiṁsu. Titikkhissati. Atitikkhissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:675: Khappaccayābhāve appaccayassa ekāro, tejeti, tejati vā, tejanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:676: Gupa gopane, chappaccaye dvibhāvo, ‘‘pubbobbhāso’’ti abbhāsasaññā, ‘‘abbhāsassā’’ti vattamāne ‘‘antassivaṇṇākāro vā’’ti abbhāsantassikāro, ‘‘kavaggassa cavaggo’’ti abbhāsagakārassa jakāro ca.
anya-e0805n5:678: Dhātvanthassa byañjanassa cakārādeso hoti chappaccayesu paresu. Tato vibhattiyo, kāyaṁ jigucchati, jigucchanti. Sesaṁ purimasamaṁ. Chābhāve gopeti, gopenti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:682: Abbhāsagatānaṁ māna kitaiccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ vakāratakārattaṁ hoti vā yathākkamanti takāro, dhātvantassa cakāro, sesaṁ samaṁ. Rogaṁ tikicchati, tikicchanti iccādi. Takārābhāve ‘‘kavaggassa cavaggo’’ti cakāro, vicikicchati, vicikicchanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:685: Tato abbhāsato parāsaṁ pāmānānaṁ dhātūnaṁ vāmaṁiccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṁ sappaccaye pare. Sesūti bahuvacananiddeso payogepi vacanavipallāsañāpanatthaṁ. Atthaṁ vīmaṁsati, vīmaṁsanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:690: Bhuja ghasa hara su pā iccevamādīhi dhātūhi tumicchatthesu ca kha cha saiccete paccayā honti vā. Tumicchānaṁ, tumantayuttaicchāya vā atthā tumicchatthā, tena tumantarahitesu ‘‘bhojanamicchatī’’tiādīsu na honti, ‘‘vuttatthānamappayogo’’ti vākyassa appayogo, dhātvādissa dvebhāve kate ‘‘dutiyacatutthānaṁ paṭhamatatiyā’’ti abbhāsabhakārassa bakāro, dhātvantassa ‘‘ko khe cā’’ti kakāro, bubhukkhati, bubhukkhanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:691: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Bhottumicchati, icchatthesūti kimatthaṁ? Bhottuṁ gacchati.
anya-e0805n5:692: Ghasa adane, ghasitumicchatīti atthe chappaccayo, dvittaṁ, tatiya cavagga ikāra cakārādesā, jighacchati, jighacchanti.
anya-e0805n5:695: Haraiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa gī hoti se paccaye pare. ‘‘Gīse’’ti yogavibhāgena jissapi, ṭhānūpacārenādesassāpi dhātuvohārattā dvittaṁ, bhikkhaṁ jigīsati, jigīsanti.
anya-e0805n5:696: Su savaṇe, sotumicchati sussūsati, sussūsanti, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā dīgho.
anya-e0805n5:697: Pā pāne, pātumicchatīti atthe sappaccayadvittarassattaikārādesā, ‘‘tato pāmānānaṁ vāmaṁ sesū’’ti vādeso, pivāsati, pivāsanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:699: Saṅgho pabbatamiva attānamācarati, pabbato iva ācaratīti vā atthe –
anya-e0805n5:701: Ācaraṇakriyāya kattuno upamānabhūtamhā nāmato āyappaccayo hoti ācāratthe. Upamīyati etenāti upamānaṁ, kattuno upamānaṁ kattupamānaṁ, ‘‘vuttatthānamappayogo’’ti ivasaddanivatti, dhātuppaccayantattā ‘‘tesaṁ vibhattiyo lopā cā’’ti sutte tesaṁgahaṇena vibhattilopo, ‘‘pakati cassa sarantassā’’ti pakatibhāvo, saralopādi, ‘‘dhātuppaccayehi vibhattiyo’’ti vibhattuppatti, pabbatāyati saṅgho, evaṁ samuddamiva attānamācarati samuddāyati, cicciṭamiva attānamācarati cicciṭāyati saddo. Evaṁ dhūmāyati.
anya-e0805n5:704: Upamānabhūtā nāmato īyappaccayo hoti ācāratthe. Puna upamānaggahaṇaṁ kattuggahaṇanivattanatthaṁ, tena kammatopi sijjhati, sesaṁ samaṁ. Achattaṁ chattamivācarati chattīyati, aputtaṁ puttamivācarati puttīyati sissamācariyo.
anya-e0805n5:705: Upamānāti kiṁ? Dhammamācarati, ācāreti kiṁ? Achattaṁ chattamiva rakkhati.
anya-e0805n5:708: Nāmamhā attano icchatthe īyappaccayo hoti. Attano pattamicchati pattīyati, evaṁ vatthīyati, parikkhārīyati, cīvarīyati, paṭīyati, dhanīyati, puttīyati.
anya-e0805n5:713: Dhātuyā rūpe nipphādetabbe, ‘‘taṁ karoti, tena atikkamati’’iccādike payujjitabbe vā sati nāmamhā ṇayappaccayo hoti, kāritasaññā ca. Ṇalope, vibhattilopasaralopādīsu katesu vibhattuppatti, daḷhayati vīriyaṁ, evaṁ pamāṇayati, amissayati, tathā hatthinā atikkamati atihatthayati, vīṇāya upagāyati upavīṇayati, visuddhā hoti ratti visuddhayati, kusalaṁ pucchati kusalayati iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:714: 540.Dhātūhi ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayā kāritāni hetvatthe.
anya-e0805n5:715: Sabbehi dhātūhi hetvatthe abhidheyye ṇe ṇayaṇāpe ṇāpaya iccete paccayā parā honti, te kāritasaññā ca honti. Hetuyeva attho hetvattho, so ca ‘‘yo kāreti sa hetū’’ti laddhahetusañño suddhakattuno payojako hetukattā, atthato pesanajjhesanādiko payojakabyāpāro idha hetu nāma.
anya-e0805n5:717: Ṇe ṇayāva uvaṇṇantā, āto dve pacchimā siyuṁ;
anya-e0805n5:719: Akammā dhātavo honti, kārite tu sakammakā;
anya-e0805n5:722: Na bhāve suddhakattā ca, kārite kammasaññito.
anya-e0805n5:725: Tattha yo koci bhavati, tamañño ‘‘bhavāhi bhavāhi’’ iccevaṁ bravīti, atha vā bhavantaṁ bhavituṁ samatthaṁ payojayati, bhavituṁ payojetīti vā atthe iminā ṇeṇayappaccayā, kāritasaññā ca, ‘‘vuttatthānamappayogo’’ti vākyassa appayogo, ‘‘kāritānaṁ ṇo lopa’’nti ṇalopo, ‘‘asaṁyogantassa vuddhi kārite’’ti ūkārassokāro vuddhi.
anya-e0805n5:728: Te dhātvantabhūtā okārekārā āvaāyādese pāpuṇanti kārite pare. ‘‘Te āvāyā’’ti yogavibhāgena jheādīnaṁ akāritepi hontīti okārassa āvādeso, saralopādi, ‘‘dhātuppaccayehi vibhattiyo’’ti tyādayo.
anya-e0805n5:729: So samādhiṁ bhāveti, bhāvayati, bhāventi, bhāvayanti. Bhāvesi, bhāvayasi, bhāvetha, bhāvayatha. Bhāvemi, bhāvayāmi, bhāvema, bhāvayāma. Bhāvayate, bhāvayante.
anya-e0805n5:730: Kamme attanopadayappaccayaīkārāgamā, saralopādi ca, tena bhāvīyate samādhi, bhāvīyante. Bhāvīyati, bhāvīyanti.
anya-e0805n5:731: Tathā bhāvetu, bhāvayatu, bhāventu, bhāvayantu. Bhāvehi, bhāvaya, bhāvayāhi, bhāvetha, bhāvayatha . Bhāvemi, bhāvayāmi, bhāvema, bhāvayāma. Bhāvayataṁ, bhāvayantaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:733: Bhāveyya, bhāvaye, bhāvayeyya, bhāveyyuṁ, bhāvayeyyuṁ. Bhāveyyāsi, bhāvayeyyāsi, bhāveyyātha, bhāvayeyyātha. Bhāveyyāmi, bhāvayeyyāmi, bhāveyyāma, bhāvayeyyāma. Bhāvetha, bhāvayetha, bhāveraṁ, bhāvayeraṁ.
anya-e0805n5:736: Abhāvesi, bhāvesi, abhāvayi, bhāvayi, abhāvesuṁ, bhāvesuṁ, abhāvayiṁsu, bhāvayiṁsu, abhāvayuṁ, bhāvayuṁ. Abhāvesi, abhāvayasi, abhāvittha, abhāvayittha. Abhāvesiṁ, bhāvesiṁ, abhāvayiṁ, bhāvayiṁ, abhāvimha, abhāvayimha.
anya-e0805n5:738: Bhāvessati, bhāvayissati, bhāvessanti, bhāvayissanti. Bhāvessasi, bhāvayissasi, bhāvissatha, bhāvayissatha. Bhāvessāmi, bhāvayissāmi, bhāvessāma, bhāvayissāma.
anya-e0805n5:740: Abhāvissa, abhāvayissa, abhāvissaṁsu, abhāvayissaṁsu. Kamme abhāvīyissatha, abhāvīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:741: Tathā yo koci pacati, tamañño ‘‘pacāhi pacāhi’’ iccevaṁ bravīti, atha vā pacantaṁ payojeti, pacituṁ vā payojetīti atthe vuttanayena ṇe ṇayādayo, akārassākāro vuddhi, sesaṁ neyyaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:742: So devadattaṁ odanaṁ pāceti, pācenti. Pācesi, pācetha. Pācemi, pācema. Pācayati, pācayanti. Pācayasi, pācayatha. Pācayāmi, pācayāma. Ṇāpeṇāpayesu pana so puriso taṁ purisaṁ odanaṁ pācāpeti, pācāpenti. Pācāpayati, pācāpayanti.
anya-e0805n5:743: Kamme so odanaṁ pācīyati tena, pācayīyati, pācāpīyati, pācāpayīyati.
anya-e0805n5:744: Tathā pācetu, pācayatu, pācāpetu, pācāpayatu. Pācīyataṁ, pācīyatu, pācayīyataṁ, pācayīyatu, pācāpīyataṁ, pācāpīyatu, pācāpayīyataṁ, pācāpayīyatu. Pāceyya, pācayeyya, pācāpeyya, pācāpayeyya. Pācīyeyya, pācīyeyyuṁ. Apācesi, apācayi, apācāpesi, apācāpayi. Pācessati, pācayissati, pācāpessati, pācāpayissati. Apācissa, apācayissa, apācāpissa, apācāpayissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:745: Gacchantaṁ, gantuṁ vā payojetīti atthe ṇe ṇayādayo, vuddhiyaṁ sampattāyaṁ –
anya-e0805n5:748: Ghaṭādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ asaṁyogantānaṁ vuddhi hoti vā kāriteti ettha vāggahaṇena vuddhi na hoti, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo.
anya-e0805n5:749: So taṁ purisaṁ gāmaṁ gameti, gamayati, gacchāpeti, gacchāpayati. So gāmaṁ gamīyati tena, gamayīyati, gacchāpīyati, gacchāpayīyati iccādi. Sabbattha yojetabbaṁ. Evaṁ uparipi.
anya-e0805n5:750: Ghaṭa īhāyaṁ, ghaṭantaṁ payojayati, ghaṭeti, ghaṭādīnaṁ vāti na vuddhi, ghaṭayati, ghaṭāpeti, ghaṭāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:753: Guhadusaiccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ saro dīghamāpajjate kārite pare, vuddhāpavādoyaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:754: Guha saṁvaraṇe, guhituṁ payojayati gūhayati, gūhayanti. Dusa appītimhi, dussantaṁ payojayati dūsayati, dūsayanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:755: Tathā icchantaṁ payojayati icchāpeti, icchāpayati, eseti, esayati. Niyacchantaṁ payojayati niyāmeti, niyāmayati. Āsantaṁ payojayati āseti, āsayati, acchāpeti, acchāpayati. Labhantaṁ payojayati lābheti, lābhayati. Vacantaṁ payojayati vāceti, vācayati, vācāpeti, vācāpayati. Evaṁ vāseti, vāsayati, vāsāpeti, vāsāpayati. Vāheti, vāhayati, vāhāpeti, vāhāpayati. Jīreti, jīrayati, jīrāpeti, jīrāpayati. Māreti, mārayati, mārāpeti, mārāpayati. Dasseti, dassayati iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:756: Tathā tudantaṁ payojayati todeti, todayati, todāpeti, todāpayati. Pavisantaṁ payojayati, pavisituṁ vā paveseti, pavesayati, pavesāpeti , pavesāpayati. Uddisantaṁ payojayati uddisāpeti, uddisāpayati. Pahontaṁ payojayati pahāveti, pahāvayati. Sayantaṁ payojayati sāyeti, sāyayati, sāyāpeti, sāyāpayati. Ettha ekārassa āyādeso, sayāpeti, sayāpayati, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā ṇāpeṇāpayesu āyādesassa rassattaṁ. Nayantaṁ payojayati nayāpeti, nayāpayati. Patiṭṭhantaṁ payojayati patiṭṭhāpeti, patiṭṭhāpayati, patiṭṭhapeti vā.
anya-e0805n5:760: Hanaiccetassa dhātussa ghātādeso hoti ṇakāravati kāritappaccaye pare. Ghāteti, ghātayati, ghātāpeti, ghātāpayati, ‘‘vadho vā sabbatthā’’ti vadhādese vadheti, vadhāpeti.
anya-e0805n5:761: Juhontaṁ payojayati juhāveti, juhāvayati. Jahantaṁ payojayati jahāpeti, jahāpayati, hāpeti, hāpayati. Dadantaṁ payojayati dāpeti, dāpayati. Pidahantaṁ payojayati pidhāpeti, pidhāpayati, pidahāpeti, pidahāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:762: Rundhantaṁ payojayati rodheti, rodhayati, rodhāpeti, rodhāpayati. Chindantaṁ payojayati chedeti, chedayati, chedāpeti, chedāpayati. Yuñjantaṁ payojayati yojeti, yojayati, yojāpeti, yojāpayati. Bhuñjantaṁ payojayati bhojeti, bhojayati, bhojāpeti, bhojāpayati. Muñcantaṁ payojayati moceti, mocayati, mocāpeti, mocāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:763: Dibbantaṁ payojayati deveti, devayati. Uppajjantaṁ payojayati uppādeti, uppādayati. Bujjhantaṁ payojayati bodheti, bodhayati. ‘‘Dādhāntato yo kvacī’’ti yakārāgamo, bujjhāpeti, bujjhāpayati. Tussantaṁ payojayati toseti, tosayati, tosāpeti, tosāpayati. Sammantaṁ payojayati sameti, samayati, ghaṭādittā na vuddhi. Kuppantaṁ payojayati kopeti, kopayati. Jāyantaṁ payojayati janeti, janayati, ghaṭādittā na vuddhi.
anya-e0805n5:764: Suṇantaṁ payojayati dhammaṁ sāveti, sāvayati. Pāpuṇantaṁ payojayati pāpeti, pāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:765: Vikkiṇantaṁ payojayati vikkāyāpeti, vikkāyāpayati. Jinantaṁ payojayati jayāpeti, jayāpayati. Jānantaṁ payojayati ñāpeti, ñāpayati. Gaṇhantaṁ payojayati gāheti, gāhayati, gāhāpeti, gāhāpayati, gaṇhāpeti, gaṇhāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:766: Vitanantaṁ payojayati vitāneti, vitānayati. Yo koci karoti, tamañño ‘‘karohi karohi’’iccevaṁ bravīti, karontaṁ payojayati, kātuṁ vā kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti, kārāpayati iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:767: Corentaṁ payojayati corāpeti, corāpayati. Cintentaṁ payojayati cintāpeti, cintāpayati , pūjentaṁ payojayati pūjāpeti, pūjāpayati iccādi. Sabbattha subodhaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:770: Tena titikkhantaṁ payojayati titikkheti, titikkhāpeti. Tikicchantaṁ payojayati tikiccheti, tikicchayati, tikicchāpeti, tikicchāpayati. Evaṁ bubhukkheti, bubhukkhayati, bubhukkhāpeti, bubhukkhāpayati, pabbatāyantaṁ payojayati pabbatāyayati. Puttīyayati iccādipi siddhaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0805n5:777: Taṁ yathā bhikkhu bhāveti, maggaṁ rāgādidūsakanti.
